title: Nuki Smart Lock
summary: Turn your smartphone into your key. Smart, simple & secure.
description: ★★★The first smart door lock for Europe now on Google Play★★★A small upgrade to your door lock, making life so much easier. With Nuki and your smartphone, you can now easily retrofit your door lock for smart access. Nuki Smart Lock is mounted on the inside of your existing door lock and ready to be used within 3 minutes without any further assistance. No screws, no drills.Here is what Nuki can do for you:• Turns your smartphone into a smart key• Auto-Unlock automatically unlocks the door as you approach• Share access codes with friends & loved-ones easily via SMS/Whatsapp right from the Nuki app• Lock and unlock your door remotely with Nuki Bridge via Wifi• Check the status of your lock anytime and anywhere on your smartphone• Never loose any keys again• Compatible with Android Wear to control your lock from your smartwatchGet Nuki Smart Lock now from the Nuki Shop: https://shop.nuki.io/Your benefits with Nuki:Smart - Nuki unlocks your door automatically when you come home and locks it again when you leave. The key stays in the lock while your phone stays in your pocket.Simple - Nuki Smart Lock is mounted on the inside of your existing door lock and ready to be used within 3 minutes without any further assistance. No screws, no drills.Secure - Stay in control of your Nuki Smart Lock by checking the status on your smartphone anytime and by managing access permissions for your friends and loved-ones.Remote - The Nuki Bridge brings your Smart Lock online, so you can manage and control it remotely with the Nuki app anytime and anywhere.Installation requirements for Nuki Smart Lock:• Bluetooth Smart Ready phone (Bluetooth 4.0 and higher)• Android 4.4 and higher• Operating temperature: 10–40 °C• Designed for indoor use only• Door with Euro profile cylinder and emergency and danger functionYou can check the compatibility of your door lock with Nuki here: www.nuki.io/check.-------------------------We’d love to hear from you. If you have questions about Nuki products please contact us at contact@nuki.io, or visit us on http://www.facebook.com/nuki.smartlock/, http://www.twitter.com/nuki_smartlock or https://www.youtube.com/c/NukiIock.-------------------------You think Nuki would be a good idea for your smart home? Go and get one: https://shop.nuki.io/
descriptionHTML:
★★★The first smart door lock for Europe now on Google Play★★★

A small upgrade to your door lock, making life so much easier. With Nuki and your smartphone, you can now easily retrofit your door lock for smart access. Nuki Smart Lock is mounted on the inside of your existing door lock and ready to be used within 3 minutes without any further assistance. No screws, no drills.

Here is what Nuki can do for you:
• Turns your smartphone into a smart key
• Auto-Unlock automatically unlocks the door as you approach
• Share access codes with friends & loved-ones easily via SMS/Whatsapp right from the Nuki app
• Lock and unlock your door remotely with Nuki Bridge via Wifi
• Check the status of your lock anytime and anywhere on your smartphone
• Never loose any keys again
• Compatible with Android Wear to control your lock from your smartwatch

Get Nuki Smart Lock now from the Nuki Shop: https://shop.nuki.io/

Your benefits with Nuki:

Smart - Nuki unlocks your door automatically when you come home and locks it again when you leave. The key stays in the lock while your phone stays in your pocket.

Simple - Nuki Smart Lock is mounted on the inside of your existing door lock and ready to be used within 3 minutes without any further assistance. No screws, no drills.

Secure - Stay in control of your Nuki Smart Lock by checking the status on your smartphone anytime and by managing access permissions for your friends and loved-ones.

Remote - The Nuki Bridge brings your Smart Lock online, so you can manage and control it remotely with the Nuki app anytime and anywhere.

Installation requirements for Nuki Smart Lock:
• Bluetooth Smart Ready phone (Bluetooth 4.0 and higher)
• Android 4.4 and higher
• Operating temperature: 10–40 °C
• Designed for indoor use only
• Door with Euro profile cylinder and emergency and danger function

You can check the compatibility of your door lock with Nuki here: www.nuki.io/check.


-------------------------

We’d love to hear from you. If you have questions about Nuki products please contact us at contact@nuki.io, or visit us on http://www.facebook.com/nuki.smartlock/, http://www.twitter.com/nuki_smartlock or https://www.youtube.com/c/NukiIock.

-------------------------

You think Nuki would be a good idea for your smart home? Go and get one: https://shop.nuki.io/
comments: Latest update destroyed battery life. I had at least a month on a pack of batteries. Now I have a week at best. Fix this!!! It is ruining the device !

I love Nuki. I have the lock and bridge. Pairing the bridge was not as easy. It wasn't clear to me if the pairing was successful or failed. Big issue for me although is that the smartwatch app does not work properly on my Moto 360. It says my phone is not paired but it is paired. Also I'd like to use my watch to open the door without having to have my phone on me. Let me know if you guys will do something about this
Will a version be released for the Samsung S3 Frontier smart watch?
The app has room for improvement and I hope that they keep improving things. There is also scope for added hardware, entry pads etc. But all in all it's a great start and it works well.
Geonfencing often not work, and the BT connection is flaky sometimes. Overall the concept is brilliant and I never want to miss my Nuki.
